01011001 10010110 10100100 01010101
0	 1	  2	   3
01011001 10010110 10100100 01010100

2
00010110 01100101 10101001 00010101
0	 1	  2<<6	   3>>2
01011001 10010110 00000000 00010101

4
00000101 10011001 01101010 01000101
0	 1	  2<<4	   3>>4
01011001 10010110 01000000 00000101

6
00000001 01100110 01011010 10010001
0	 1	  2<<2	   3>>6
01011001 10010110 10010000 00000001

8
00000000 01011001 10010110 10100100
0	 1	  2<<0	   3>>8
01011001 10010110 10100100 00000000

10 = 2
00000000 00010110 01100101 10101001
0	 1<<6	  2>>2	   3x
01011001 10000000 00101001

12 = 4
00000000 00000101 10011001 01101010
0	 1<<4	  2>>4	   3x
01011001 01100000 00001010

14 = 6
00000000 00000001 01100110 01011010
0	 1<<2	  2>>6	   3x
01011001 01011000 00000010

16 = 8
00000000 00000000 01011001 10010110
0	 1<<0	  2>>8	   3x
01011001 10010110 00000000

18 = 2
00000000 00000000 00010110 01100101
0<<6	 1>>2	  2x	   3x
01000000 00100101

20 = 4
00000000 00000000 00000101 10011001
0<<4	 1>>4	  2x	   3x
10010000 00001001

22 = 6
00000000 00000000 00000001 01100110
0<<2	 1>>6	  2x	   3x
01100100 00000010

24 = 8
00000000 00000000 00000000 01011001
0<<0	 1>>8	  2x	   3x
01011001 00000000

26 = 2

30 = 6

00000001
